typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SLNO as integer,
		Count as integer,
		TANO as string,
		TASKID as double,
		TAPHASE as string,
		TASK as string,
		TASKNOTE as string,
		{DUR-HRS} as double,
		OWNR as string,
		CONTR as string,
		ImageSLNO as double,
		Add1 as string,
		Add2 as string,
		Add3 as string,
		Add4 as string,
		Created as timestamp,
		Createdby as string,
		Modified as timestamp,
		Modifiedby as string,
		WCSCode as string,
		PlanStart as timestamp,
		PlanFinish as timestamp,
		ActStart as timestamp,
		ActFinish as timestamp,
		ScheduleID as string,
		RequestType as string,
		PercentProgress as decimal(28,6),
		IsSign1Allowed as boolean,
		IsSign2Allowed as boolean,
		IsSign3Allowed as boolean,
		IsSign4Allowed as boolean,
		IsSign5Allowed as boolean,
		IsSign6Allowed as boolean,
		IsSign7Allowed as boolean,
		IsSign8Allowed as boolean,
		IsSign9Allowed as boolean,
		IsSign10Allowed as boolean,
		Sign01 as string,
		Sign02 as string,
		Sign03 as string,
		Sign04 as string,
		Sign05 as string,
		Sign06 as string,
		Sign07 as string,
		Sign08 as string,
		Sign09 as string,
		Sign10 as string,
		Sign01Date as timestamp,
		Sign02Date as timestamp,
		Sign03Date as timestamp,
		Sign04Date as timestamp,
		Sign05Date as timestamp,
		Sign06Date as timestamp,
		Sign07Date as timestamp,
		Sign08Date as timestamp,
		Sign09Date as timestamp,
		Sign10Date as timestamp,
		RemarksSign1 as string,
		RemarksSign2 as string,
		RemarksSign3 as string,
		RemarksSign4 as string,
		RemarksSign5 as string,
		RemarksSign6 as string,
		RemarksSign7 as string,
		RemarksSign8 as string,
		RemarksSign9 as string,
		RemarksSign10 as string,
		CoordinateSign1 as string,
		CoordinateSign2 as string,
		CoordinateSign3 as string,
		CoordinateSign4 as string,
		CoordinateSign5 as string,
		CoordinateSign6 as string,
		CoordinateSign7 as string,
		CoordinateSign8 as string,
		CoordinateSign9 as string,
		CoordinateSign10 as string,
		Status as string,
		WCSTemplateID as string,
		Weightage as decimal(28,6),
		LimtProg as decimal(28,6),
		ForecastStart as timestamp,
		ForecastEnd as timestamp,
		ReworkCount as decimal(28,6),
		ActTempID as string,
		ForecastLateStart as timestamp,
		ForecastLateEnd as timestamp,
		p6_task_id as integer,
		CalID as integer,
		AutoRel as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceSTEPS
